prompt: Generate Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 telemetry configuration to monitor L2VPN xconnect/pseudowire operational state. Use gRPC with no TLS. Telemetry server address is 192.0.2.110 with port 57500. Choose relevant sensor-paths.
completion:
telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group L2VPN-XCONNECT-OPER
 sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-oper:l2vpnv2/active/xconnects
 sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-oper:l2vpnv2/active/pseudowires
 sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-oper:l2vpnv2/active/bridge-domains
 !
 destination-group DG-L2VPN
 address-family ipv4
 destination 192.0.2.110
 port 57500
 encoding self-describing-gpb
 protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-L2VPN
 sensor-group-id L2VPN-XCONNECT-OPER sample-interval 60000
 destination-group-id DG-L2VPN
 !
!
